name: Dungeon Chaos
description:
Made by Jahanxaib for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Theme: Let There Be Chaos

Dungeon Chaos is a hardcore platformer game in which you have to escape the dungeon avoiding a lot of spikes and enemies.

You play as a character with a shotgun and torch in your hands. And you are trapped in a dungeon full of spikes and enemies.

Controls

Arrows or A & D  -- Move

Spacebar  -- Jump

Mouse 0   -- Shoot
